comments.body: I was about to post this but then I saw this post and I really want it back. I don’t want to have to invite my friends over to my house and play on my Xbox 360 when I can just do it on my iPad while calling my friends if they can’t come over. It would take more work but it would be worth it Mojang. I agree with you registered user.

Minigames were fun and could be played private or online.

Mojang stopped minigames and this definitely led to minecraft losing popularity.
Minigames were and still are my favourite part of minecraft. I still play ps4 edition most of the time
Registered User, I love you and your idea. Thank you
I disagree with this post, but I understand how you find them annoying.
Just sleep and you can avoid them
“JuST SLeEP!” It’s not like being forced to sleep every 3 days really improves my Minecraft experience.
Honestly, no one go around with more that one arrow nowdays, because the crossbow is not worthed in comparison to the bow. For the rest, it's a good idea.

I love this idea! Their current reasoning for not allowing the elytra to be equipped with a chest plate is a "tradeoff" between defense and flight, but adding other items to be equipped in this slot would create tradeoffs of their own as one could not have extra storage of a backpack, flight, or the arrow organization of a quiver all at once.
There is a mod called Fresh Animations it has a lot of good animations the basic animals of Minecraft have basic animations that can use some working on

I wanna change my name :(
I want to change my name plsssss
I agree they should definitely decrease the rate that health depletes in bedrock.
It could possibly add the particles as well, but through commands that is already done so it would not be as useful
should just hide particles
Either that, or an enchantment that goes on armor. (an enchantment that makes armor disappear when an invisibility potion is drank)
Invis 2 should hide armor and particles.

There is a video on YouTube, titled as "Minecraft: Pocket Edition Trailer 2015".
I mean in the start of the video it says, our thumbs have purpose now.
I cannot feel that my thumbs are able to compete with PC, Controller players or when single player, its is not easy to kill mobs as excepted.
My build speed is not that fast because everytime I move my crosshair I have to lift my thumb and tap on screen back to place a block (In Split Control).
More like I am unable to fulfill my demands in MCPE and there is only one reason that the game lacks the feature of cumtom control and claw feature.
I request to bring this feature on the upcoming Minecraft version 1.17.
Thank you.
Yeah!
We should post this to every minecraft community! That could help us!
Yes, we need a custom HUD and seperate hit/fire button and multitouch ability. Please add these features in the next update.

I don't know how much I need to emphasise on the fact that Minecraft pocket edition can get frustrating when you see PC players sweep the floor with you on PvP servers. It really sucks that I can't finish a task in one smooth go-I am required to press and lift my fingers, for every single action in the game, and it really sucks that I can't do multiple actions at once, unlike other bedrock editions. Almost all PvP games have on-screen button editing and multi-touch for claw players, but Mojang doesn't seem to be interested in getting along with the times. Some people just like to watch the world burn, haha. Once again, please fix your game. This addition can make a really big difference.
Much thanks.
Chests hide nametags

love the idea, paintings and chests do hide them, but only if your looking at the person directly through the chest, so its basically pointless as you cant make a hidden base that has to be on surface out of chests and paintings.

Yeah! I bought Minecraft on Switch, but without motion/gyro controls, I can't deal with it, so I requested a refund. It would be very precise and natural, like it is in many games, such as Zelda BOTW, Doom, Portal, Crysis, etc. Please, Mojang, add this feature!
How much hunger would the new foods heal? And also, what could you feed the different animals? Could any of them be tamed?
Typo at the start

I think finding netherite is kinda overpowered for Nether archeology, especially blocks of them. It would be fine if there would only be ancient debris or Netherite Scrap very very rarely. But I like the idea of being able to find blaze rods & blaze powder so peaceful players can actually beat the game and brew potions.
The warden is the deep dark mob.
See, the problem is: if you don't look at it, you lose, and if you do look at it, you lose.

Maybe if it didn’t take the form of a passive mob or it’s okay to look at it but if you attack it or do something seemingly aggressive to it it will attack you than I would like you but not both of those. It makes it to difficult. But I love mobs and I will vote for any new mob ideas.

bruh weeping angle 

nah-ah
Boat storage would be great. And you should be able to use the passenger seat for a chest to do so.
I like it
Nice idea
That is an amazing idea would definitely help with big builds

That is a cool idea! I think you should be able to give them blocks and they will go in love mode, and if you tap them while on love mode, the screen will become white for a second, then you are in the endermans mind, and in creative mode, then place blocks where you want, and then press the “Done” button, come out, and you see the enderman searching for the blocks you put in their mind, and when they find raw blocks, they craft the blocks they need to build, then build what you put in their mind! Building would be fun with friends, even if you aren’t signed in to Minecraft, you have friends to build with!
I think that should be a feature but you shouldn't be able to get unlimited milk and cows should eat grass to replenish their milk
I partially agree, but you can get infinite milk from cows.

I think it makes sense. However, I wonder how you would be able to tell the difference between a cow which has eaten grass and a cow which has not. Would there be no visible difference? Interesting concept, but would certainly shake things up.

I highly disagree with this. Random ticks can cause huge amounts of lag on a large scale. It would bring down server performance, especially on a multiplayer world. With so much new stuff being added to the game, lag is going to be an issue. Some sacrifices need to be made in order to keep the game playable. The only real downside of limited random ticks that I can think of is a large scale afk ice farm.

If it's a setting, this is a great idea. We need a more reasonable distance for growing crops and other random tick properties. The lag wouldn't be bad on modern decent computers anymore than having a couple of people roaming around your base, and it would be a setting. Give it a command, something needs to be done about the 128 block limit being at least partially expandable.

The performance impact of ticking more chunks must be assessed by Mojang.

But I share the desire to make more chunks receive random ticks ontop of forceloading them. At least the interface to random ticking should be exposed to the modding community and built into forceload as an option.

The current state I consider highly confusing: I found many many threads where the distinction of entity ticking (in load level 31) and chunk/random ticking was not well understood.

Netherite is strong enough to be completely resistant against tnt and because of its weight, it's harder for players with it on to be knocked back. I think it would make sense that the player would have trouble swimming with it on.

The player should sink faster the more nethrite armor that they have on, making it harder to swim, and they should fall fast enough through water to take fall damage when they have a full set on.

Whit this, it opens the possibility for a equivalence system for end game armor, making the player change their gear accordingly (situation or necessity), making Netherite a option to Diamond instead of a replacement will ensure that the Netherite/Diamond won't be obsolete in future updates.
Maybe swim up slower but not at all
Speaking of water for Minecraft live vote 2020 we saw tiny yens and tiny Agnes wearing snorkels maybe you can add that into the game? (In front of the glow squid)
a zzz icon would help tremendously.
That would be cool a cool icon for the effect and maybe when you get the effect it would play a Phantom's sound or something like the Elder Guardian does

It should be also removable with milk or sweet food ( cookie, honey, pumpkin pie and cake) and changed to be gettable  by killing a new mob or doing a specific thing,  because many players doesn't like the current feature, and not sleeping is not insomnia.

Or you could create a beacon of netherite (the new ore) and make this the reason for making it, could be a cool addition. But instead of being lost to the soulsand make it so they cant move, but it they touch lava, they die in a puff of smoke
literally heartbreaking i love it
It should be like hay, where if you fall on the edge and on another block you still take normal damage. Maybe it could be like cobwebs.
Do you mean snow will reduce falldamage?
This is a pretty good idea :)
Bro i wish
Bro i wish
There already is hardcore mode in bedrock edition, where you’re forced to delete the world when you die, but maybe Mojang can add those features to hardcore mode.

ohyeah6381 
 
That's also in Java, and I agree! However, there should at least be some chance. Maybe not have dogs go aggressive on you? Because you need a buddy that you can trust through all that. And maybe not have the Ender dragon come out of the End, it's too big to fit through that tiny portal hole.
Wow, only the most dedicated and hard-working players could beat this mode.

i like this idea, although it should probably be capped at some point, or you could end up accidentally having an ender dragon that is humanly impossible to kill. after it reaches this cap, then it should start lowering the xp output.

I propose that he have more attacks that really make the player nervous and that the difficulty is not only limited in the endermans around him, something like faster and bigger attacks with the dragon's breath or more attacks on the player to force him to stay in the center of the island or even that puts negative effects on the player similar to that of the wither or bigger explosions

I think that apart from giving less experience, increasing its life bar and inflicting more damage each time it is defeated, it would be good for the dragon to learn new movements, (ex. the second or third time you kill the dragon it learns a new movement that is "healing" and what it would do would be for the dragon to perch on the pedestal of the portal and wrap her wings as a shield, then she could not do damage with projectiles, explosions or melee damage, the only way to damage it would be with potions (for example instant damage potions) and while the dragon is wrapped in her wings she would regenerate life)
Il faudrait aussi qu'il aille plus vite à chaque combat (qu'il vole plus vite)
